locale.message: The PKP PLN plugin will deposit your published content into the PKP Public LOCKSS Network for preservation.
Choose a network to which you wish to deposit.
Before depositing to a network it is necessary to agree to all of its terms of use.
Depending on your publication methods (continuous publication, for instance) you may wish to choose to deposit articles rather than complete issues.
Depending on your rate of publication or the size of your content you may wish to deposit less or more content per deposit.
Curl is needed to communicate with the PLN.
Zip support is needed to compress your content for transmission.
If for some reason there are no terms listed above or you know these terms have been updated, click Refresh to update the terms listed above.
Please choose an deposit object type.
Please choose a deposit object threshold.
Agreement to the network's terms of use is required in order to deposit to the PLN.
Check the status of your deposits.
Your journal must have an ISSN to deposit content to the PKP PLN.
There was an error connecting to the PKP PLN - please contact your system administrator.
Terms have been updated. Agreement with new terms is required to continue depositing.
